name: s3-proxy
description: Small proxy to get stuffs and copy to s3 and retrieve for there

scripts.updateLambda: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name s3Proxy --s3-bucket lambdas.smallorange.co --s3-key s3Proxy/lambda.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run zip && npm run s3 && npm run updateLambda; npm run clean

author: Felipe Rohde
